markdownRemark.html:
For the past six months, I have been working on my new "work hobby", Perpetually Busty, a repurposed comic strip that I rewrite with the help of my favorite coworker, Amanda Flagg.

Now the zine version of all our online strips (plus a thrilling conclusion) is available for purchase! We have finally complied all the strips into a 22-page zine with color covers. Each strip is cut out of the newspaper, the speech bubbles are filled with whiteout and the dialog is rewritten.

Only $5, so snag a copy while they're hot!
